parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The "ghost touch" issue can cause the infotainment system to randomly select options, leading to distracted driving and potentially increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The infotainment screen registers inputs without anyone touching it
causing random selections and distractions while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning rearview camera can cause a safety hazard, especially when reversing, as it may not provide a clear view of the surroundings.
symptoms: The rearview camera flickers or does not work at all
and the dealer may refuse to fix the issue despite an existing recall.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning instrument cluster or panel can cause the Forward Sensing Camera system to become inoperable, leading to a safety hazard.
symptoms: The instrument cluster or panel becomes inoperable
causing the Forward Sensing Camera system to fail
and the rearview camera may not work properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracked infotainment screen can cause electrical hazards and lead to "ghost touch" issues.
symptoms: The infotainment screen cracks on its own due to weather or humidity
leading to "ghost touch" issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning FSC can cause the system to temporarily stop functioning, leading to a safety hazard.
symptoms: The FSC warning light appears on the dashboard
and the system may not function properly due to high temperatures.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine acceleration failure can cause a safety hazard, especially when driving on highways.
symptoms: The engine fails to accelerate when the throttle is applied
requiring the driver to let off the throttle and reapply it to regain acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the infotainment system can cause distractions while driving, leading to accidents, and impair the functionality of safety features such as the backup camera.
symptoms: The infotainment screen displays a blurry or distorted image
the screen separates or bubbles from the outer touch screen portion
the screen loops or reloads continuously
the system disables the backup camera or navigation
the system randomly scans and changes channels.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the backup camera can increase the risk of accidents or injuries when reversing, as the driver may not be able to see obstacles or pedestrians behind the vehicle.
symptoms: The backup camera does not operate consistently
the camera displays a streaky or jumpy image
the camera does not connect at all
the camera displays a distorted image.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the manufacturer and dealer to address the recall can lead to continued safety risks and decreased vehicle value.
symptoms: The manufacturer and dealer fail to notify the owner of the recall
the dealer claims they do not have a remedy
the recall is not performed despite being open for an extended period.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electronic braking system can cause the vehicle to roll away unexpectedly, leading to accidents, injuries, or property damage.
symptoms: The vehicle rolls away while parked
the electronic braking system engages unexpectedly
the vehicle moves on its own while in gear with the mechanical e-brake set.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Warped brake rotors can cause the vehicle to vibrate or shimmy when stopping, leading to reduced stopping power and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel shimmies or vibrates when stopping
the vehicle stops unevenly
the brake rotors are excessively worn.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Corrosion and failure of the rear brakes can cause reduced stopping power, leading to accidents, injuries, or property damage.
symptoms: Rear brake noises
reduced stopping power
corrosion on the rear brake components
frozen brake pads in the calipers.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake unit can cause loss of control, accidents, or injuries, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: Loud grinding sound from the rear of the vehicle
brake unit dislodges or falls off
loss of braking power.
